author: Simon Difford
description: A deliciously subtly absinthe (anise) and maraschino (cherry) influenced fresh take on the classic Manhattan. Serve on-the-rocks as illustrated here or serve straight-up strained into a chilled coupe. Boozy and surprisingly dry.
name: Inside Job Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)
1 Absinthe verte (green) (omit for Cocktails Made Easy)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
